fullplot: A documentary about branding, advertising and product placement that is financed and made possible by brands, advertising and product placement.
plot: A documentary about branding, advertising and product placement that is financed and made possible by brands, advertising and product placement.
title: The Greatest Movie Ever Sold

tomatoes.consensus: The Greatest Movie Ever Sold plays smartly to Spurlock's strengths, and the result is a breezy, albeit not particularly enlightening documentary.
